mecard.customer

Interface CustomerFormatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlatUserFormatter, PapiJSONCustomerFormatter, SIPFormatter

    public interface CustomerFormatter
    This class formats ILS output into Customer objects. The reverse is carried out by FormattedCustomer objects.
    Author:
    Andrew Nisbet

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Customer getCustomer(java.util.List<java.lang.String> list)
      Converts a string from ILS or SIP into a Customer object.
      Customer getCustomer(java.lang.String s)
      Converts a string from ILS or SIP into a Customer object.

    • Method Detail

      • getCustomer

        Customer getCustomer(java.util.List<java.lang.String> list)
        Converts a string from ILS or SIP into a Customer object.
        Parameters:
        list - of strings that represent the customer as it would have been received from the ILS.
        Returns:
        true if the conversion was successful and false otherwise.

      • getCustomer

        Customer getCustomer(java.lang.String s)
        Converts a string from ILS or SIP into a Customer object.
        Parameters:
        s - the string that represent the customer as it would have been received from the ILS.
        Returns:
        true if the conversion was successful and false otherwise.
